source: name of the restaurant for which menu items has been provided

nutrition.calories: value of calories content in this particular menu item. this field will always content numeric value. if no data is available then use N/A as value
nutrition.protein_g: value of protein content in this particular menu item. this field will always content numeric value. if no data is available then use N/A as value
nutrition.fat_g: value of fat content in this particular menu item. this field will always content numeric value. if no data is available then use N/A as value
nutrition.carbs_g: value of carbohydrate content in this particular menu item. this field will always content numeric value. if no data is available then use N/A as value
